reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits nicely and is well-made, with one noting it's better than any prebuilt costume. They appreciate its style and length, with one mentioning it reaches mid-thigh, while another notes it works well with both flats and ankle boots. The material is thick but not heavy, and customers like its stretchiness and comfort, with one mentioning the turtle neck doesn't feel suffocating. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect "mini" turtleneck dress - wardrobe staple
items.body: GREAT little dress. I am 5'6" and the length is well above the knee but still totally appropriate to wear anywhere with tights and boots, perhaps. I will get lots of use out of this dress as it's timeless and versatile. I went by the chart and this fits true to size. I purchased an M but totally could have gotten the L based on how it fits. If you are on the edge size-wise and you don't want it to be so clingy, you could go up as there is so much stretch. The knit if good quality and it is not see through at all (in the dark color at least) Feels great on! Color is perfect deep forest green. Read more
items.author: ED

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
items.body: At first i thought that $30-something for a dress from Amazon was expensive but i was pleasantly surprised with the quality. It’s thick, stretchy, and super comfortable. It’s not quite “bodycon” because of the stretch and thickness but I didn’t buy it for that so I don’t mind. I’m 5’2 and it stops at my knees. I actually do love it and will be wearing it often. Read more
items.author: Blaker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, without being too thick or heavy!
items.body: This snow white sweater dress is such a pretty looking dress. It is a perfect fit and feels nice and warm, without being too thick or heavy. It's a perfect length too, reaching mid-thigh. I'll wear this sweater dress with a pair of silky and shiny nude pantyhose and a sexy pair of high heels for a wondeful feminine feeling. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too long
items.body: This is a nicely made, well-tailored yet stretchy sweater dress. I’m 5’3” and weigh 130 pounds, and while I really like the dress, I’ll be returning it because it seems designed for someone taller. On me, it hits just below the knee and looks a bit too long. Read more
items.author: Irene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shockingly flattering
items.body: Despite being a bodycon dress, it doesn't hug every flaw like many of them do. This looked absolutely great, and was very soft and comfortable. If you are wearing tights underneath, you might find the show a little bit more than you'd like, and the stretchy fabric can get pulled out of place by the tights. Read more
items.author: Shan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for what i needed
items.body: bought for an ada wong cosplay and was honestly really impressed with the quality! it was very comfortable, i have no complaints despite usually having texture issues with turtlenecks. genuinely considering adding it to my closet as opposed to just using it for cons/cosplays. i bought an xs and it generally it fit in all the places it should, though it was a little looser than expected because of the stretch. not sure if that will change after it's washed. it's nothing that isn't manageable for me, though. i'm about 5'3, 125-130lbs, and wear a size 2 in pants for perspective. if you're smaller than me it'll probably be less flattering, so if you're looking for something tight this probably won't work for you. it was longer than i needed (goes to knees) but it was easy to fold up for the length i desired, and the fold of the fabric underneath was unnoticeable, so length is easily adjustable for whatever look you're going for. the color burgundy was also beautiful and perfect for my cosplay. if you're between sizes, i'd go with the smaller option though, because it is very stretchy. Read more
items.author: h

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits exactly as described and is perfect in every way!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! It fits exactly as described and is perfect in every way. The fabric moves beautifully, and it doesn't bunch or ride up—just flows nicely with every step. The stitching is well done, so I can tell it's made with care and attention to detail. I’m 5'1", 107 lbs, and I went with a small. It fits perfectly, with plenty of stretch to keep it comfortable but not so thin that it shows any lines underneath. The material is thick enough that you don't have to worry about visible stocking lines, which is a huge plus. I’m super happy with my purchase and highly recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Beth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Classy Winter Dress
items.body: These were perfect for a classy modest look. Bought these for a holiday party in December. Paired well w/ my knee high healed boots & trench coat. Material is thick, form fitting but not too tight, & the turtle neck didn’t feel suffocating. I’m 5’2 125lbs & I ordered an XS. Read more
items.author: Shan Shan Price

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Hot Pink, Black, Babyblue, Coffee, Orange, Dark Green, Olive, Red, Lilac, Navy, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
